Name: Style console logs
Description: Can I apply style to the log statements in the console?
Author: @pankajparashar

Chrome.References:
1. "Secrets of the Browser Developer Tools" by [devtoolsecrets.com](http://devtoolsecrets.com/)
2. Tips & Tricks #2 of the [Newsletter](https://www.getrevue.co/profile/CanIDevTools/issues/tips-tricks-2-1159708)
Chrome.Notes:
1. Open console using `Cmd+Option+J` or `Ctrl+Shift+J`.
2. Prefix the log statement with `%c`, and supply the CSS styles as the second argument to `console.log()`. For example, 
```
console.log(
  "%cThis is green text with yellow background",
  "color:green; background:yellow"
)
```
Chrome.Name: Style console logs
